JUSTICE ASHOK MENON FRIDAY, THE 10TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 20TH POUSHA, 1941 Cr1.MC.No.8177 OF 2019(B AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 465/2015 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS ,PAYYANNUR CRIME NO.393/2010 OF Payangadi Police Station , Kannur PETITIONER/ACCUSED NO.4: MUHAMMED SHEHEED, AGED 32 YEARS S/O. MUSTHAFA, MUTHARI MUZHALIYARE VALAPPIL HOUSE, MATTUL AMSOM, KAVILE PARAMBA, P.O. MATTUL NORTH, KANNUR DISTRICT 670 325. 2 AJMAL.C.C, AGED 31 YEARS, S/O. IBRAHIM KUTTY, CHADICHIRE CHALIL HOUSE, MATTUAL AMSOM, NEAR MATTUL NORTH POST OFFICE, MATTUL NORTH, KANNUR DISTRICT 670 325. 3 ASAHRUDEEN.M.P, AGED 29 YEARS, S/O. ABDULLA, MUTTON POOVATHINKAL HOUSE, MATTUL AMSOM, KAVILE PARAMBA, MATTUL NORTH POST OFFICE, KANNUR DISTRICT 670 325. 4 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031. R1-3 BY ADV. SHRI.SHAMEM M.S. OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 10.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2020/KER/1339 Crl.MC 8177/2019 2 ASHOK MENON, J. rl.MC No.8177 of 2019 pated this the 10% day of January, 2020 ORDER Petitioner is the fourth accused in Crime No.393/2010 of Pazhayangadi Police Station for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 341, 323, 324 and 506Cii) read with Section 149 IPC along with other accused. It is submitted that the third accused died and the case against him abated. The rest of the accused faced trial in CC No.862/2010 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Payyannur for the said offence and they were all found not guilty = and acquitted vide judgment dated 6.5.2015 at Annexure-II, in which it 1s stated that the injured/witnesses did not identify their assailants. The judgment has since become final. The case against the petitioner has been split up and is presently pending as CC No.465/2015 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Payyannur. No purpose whatsoever would be 2020/KER/1339 Crl.MC 8177/2019 3 served by proceeding with the trial as against the petitioner, which would only amount to exercise in Futility. In the result, the Criminal M.cC. is allowed and the entire proceedings as against the petitioner herein in cc No.465/2015 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Payyannur shall stand quashed under Section 482 cr.PC and the petitioner/accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE 59 A By iat 2020/KER/1339 Crl.MC 8177/2019 4 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO. 393/2010 OF PAZHAYANGADI POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE II THE COPY OF THE JUDGMENT IN C.C. NO. 465/2015 BY THE JFCM COURT, PAYYANNUR. ANNEXURE III SWORN AFFIDAVIT OF 1ST RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE IV SWORN AFFIDAVIT OF 2ND RESPONDENT. ANNEXURE V SWORN AFFIDAVIT OF 3RD RESPONDENT.
